forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 5 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco awakens to a morning filled with the warm embrace of sunshine, a welcome contrast to its famously fog-laden days. The forecast hints at a pleasant high near 70, tapering to around 67 in the afternoon as the gentle west-northwest breeze stirs with gusts reaching up to 28 mph. The air, crisp and refreshing, showcases the city’s iconic skyline against a flawless azure backdrop, inviting both locals and visitors to explore its streets. By nightfall, the clarity remains intact but softens into a cooler embrace, with temperatures dipping to around 51 and the wind carrying a whisper of the sea.

This splendid weather finds its canvas devoid of fog, allowing for sweeping views across the bay. The marine layer—often a peculiar companion of the coastal clime—appears to have chosen a day of respite, leaving the Golden Gate Bridge and its scenic surrounding hills shimmering under the sun. As one considers daily attire, layering becomes a deft practice; a light jacket or a cozy sweater would serve well in the evening chill after a day of leisurely strolls or perhaps a quiet reading session at a favorite café. With conditions this inviting, the day beckons for a casual exploration—maybe an afternoon at Dolores Park, enjoying the company of friends over a shared picnic, or a leisurely visit to the bustling Ferry Building Marketplace, reveling in artisan delicacies.
